column4: I can't seem to get the ubuntu live cd to run. It starts to, I get the keyboard and lil'guy icon, then the I get a white pixelated bar at the bottom of the screen.
Anyone know how to correct this?
try kubuntu, that might work
I don't like KDE. Is that my only choice now?
it might not even work - it could be an X problem
So, does anyone know how to solve X video issues?
what hardware are you using (video card specifically)
Galaxy nVidia Gefore GT 610
is my video card
u on a laytoy then?
*laptop
I'm on a desktop
have you installed this? https://www.google.ie/search?q=GT+610+linux+driver
I can't get to a desktop to install anything
do it from the command line
I don't get a command line either
it's not that hard you'd be doing it that way on the desktoy anyway
I get the keyboard plus lil' guy and then a screwed up screen
press a key to boot to command line
idk which key you'll have to google that
there
also try ctrl alt f2 f3 f4 etc some of them don't go to command line sometimes
